---
title: "PayScale Average Salary by Degree/Major Subject for University of Toronto Alumni Data Scrape"
output: html_notebook
---

ParentUrl = "https://www.payscale.com/research/CA/School=University_of_Toronto/Salary/by_Degree"

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```


```{r}
URL = "https://www.payscale.com/research/CA/School=University_of_Toronto/Salary/by_Degree#by_Job"

# read_html(URL) %>% 
#   html_nodes(xpath = "//*[@class = 'median-alignment']") %>% 
#   html_text() 


PayScale1 = read_html(URL) %>%
  html_table(fill = TRUE)
```


```{r}
UoftMedianSalary_byDegree = PayScale1[[1]]
UoftMedianSalary_byDegree
```

Save data into csv for later analysis
```{r}
write_csv(UoftMedianSalary_byDegree, "UoftMedianSalaryPerDegree.csv")
```
